remarks: Ortholattice meet is associative.  (This can also be proved for lattices with a longer proof.)  ( ~ inass analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 7-Nov-2011.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
olmass.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
olmass.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latmassOLD $p |- ( ( K e. OL /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) ./\ Z ) = ( X ./\ ( Y ./\ Z ) ) ) $.
